ovdesc.p: This table is used to parametrize account number generation based on PRODUCT.LINE. Routine is attached to COMPANY table ACCT.CHECKDIG.TYPE field to generate account number based on parameter setup. If parameter table is not setup then account will be generated with sequence gap 1.

desc.p: This field is an associated multi value set field used to select the product line.
This field is an associated multi value set field used to set account number generator gap. It specifies the number of digits to be left in between each accounts.

This field is an associated multi value set field used to set account number prefix. Each product line can have an individual prefix. It will assist in identify the type of account with the associated prefix.
This field is used to set default account number prefix. If PRODCUT.LINE not setup, it will use DEFAULT.PREFIX and account generator gap will be 1.
